mapper.select: SELECT c.company_code AS companyCode, c.company_id AS loginId, c.company_pw AS loginPw, c.ceo_name AS ceoName, c.site_resp AS siteResp, c.company_name AS companyName, 'company' AS loginType FROM company c WHERE c.company_code = #{companyCode} AND c.company_id = #{userId}

SELECT e.employee_no AS employeeNo, e.company_code AS companyCode, e.employee_id AS loginId, e.employee_pw AS loginPw, e.employee_resp AS employeeResp, e.rank_name AS rankName, e.department_name AS departmentName, e.employee_name AS empName, e.employee_no AS employeeNo, e.employee_resp, d.department_no, 'employee' AS loginType FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department_name = d.department_name WHERE e.company_code = #{companyCode} AND e.employee_id = #{userId}
